name: Space Mages: Dimension 33
description:
Cast spells at enemies, combine up to 4 elements to obtain new spells and defeat increasingly powerful enemies

Features:


  • Play as a powerful sorcerer cat, casting powerful combined spells against hordes of eye aliens
  • 4 elements to be combined (rock, bolt, fire and ice)
  • 16 different spells that can be used
  • 3 challenging bosses
  • Wide variety of hordes of enemies
